#Coffe Joy
The coffee shop website is a unique gallery, where each section is a sophisticated photo dedicated to the aesthetics of coffee, and interactive elements smoothly reveal information about brewing, reviews and the philosophy of the establishment. We present the site as an interactive map, where the destination is the coffee shop. By marking it, the user on the way will be able to study the reviews of previous "travelers" and immediately get all the contacts for communication.

___

___

##How to launch a project
1. Clone the repository
   ```
   git clone (paste SSH or https key)
   ```
2. Install dependencies
   ```
   npm install
   ```
3. Run a local server
   ```
   npm run dev
   ```
4. Open the address shown in the command line in your browser.
